targets.query:
from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_active" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.path == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "load1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 3600.0 }))

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temp" and r._field == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
